price: Bu, sizinle birlikte girecek bir grup, (İleri gelen azgınlar birbirlerine) rahat yüzü yok size (derler). Şüphesiz onlar cehenneme gireceklerdir.
arabic: هَٰذَا فَوۡجٞ مُّقۡتَحِمٞ مَّعَكُمۡ لَا مَرۡحَبَۢا بِهِمۡۚ إِنَّهُمۡ صَالُواْ ٱلنَّارِ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: hādhā fawjun muq'taḥimun maʿakum lā marḥaban bihim innahum ṣālū al-nāri
